item.Name: HIANG THIAN SIANG TI TEMPLE
item.Description: This temple was originally built by the Teochew immigrants from China

item.Location: Bangunan Pavilion, Jalan Tun Abang Haji Openg 93566 Kuching Sarawak
item.Description: The textile museum showcases authentic textiles made by the main ethnic

item.Name: Sarawak Tourism Complex
item.Location: Jalan Tun Abang Haji OpengKuching, Sarawak

item.Name: Sarawak Museum
item.Location: Pengarah Jabatan Muzium Negeri Sarawak, Jalan Tun Abang Haji Openg, 93566, Kuching, Sarawak 93000
item.Description: The Sarawak State Museum is the oldest museum in Borneo. It was established in 1888 and opened in 1891 in a purpose-built building in Kuching, Sarawak

item.Name: Main Bazaar, Kuching
item.Description: Main Bazaar is one of Kuching's oldest streets (dating back to 1864

item.Name: Carpenter Street, Kuching
item.Description: Carpenter Street is an old street that runs from Jalan Tun Abang Haji Openg, where the General Post Office is located

item.Name: Chinese History Museum
item.Description: located near the Kuching Waterfront and is housed in a building that was originally the Chinese Chamber of Commerce, built in 1912

item.Name: Waterfront, Kuching
item.Description: Kuching Waterfront is the esplanade on the south bank of the Sarawak River. In the 19th century, this area had warehouses and wharfs and was very busy with ships coming in to dock.

item.Name: Square Tower, Kuching
item.Description: The Square Tower is located on the Kuching Waterfront and is a white cube-like structure in the shape of a fortress

item.Name: Kuching Cat Statue, Sarawak
item.Location: Riverside Majestic Hotel on Jalan Tunku Abdul Rahman and Jalan Abell.
item.Description: One of the famous landmarks around the main town area is the Cat Statue which is located opposite the Riverside Majestic
